Prêmios: Time Magazine Canadian Newsmaker of the Year, 2004.Council of Canadians Human Rights Award, 2005.Letelier-Moffitt Human Rights Award, 2006.Nation Builder, The Globe and Mail, 2006.British Columbia Civil Liberties Association Reg Robson Award, 2007.Honorary Doctorate of Letters, Nipissing University, 2007.Time 100, 2007.
